casebody.data:
Moseley et al., Appellants, v. Sugar Food Corporation, Appellee.

[Cite as Moseley v. Sugar Food Corp. (1988), 36 Ohio St. 3d 164.]

(No. 87-1839 Decided April 13, 1988.) Parrott & Parrott, Richard E. Parrott and Robert W. Parrott, for appellants. Wiles, Doucher, Van Burén & Boyle Co., L.P.A., W. Charles Curley and Michael J. Kelley, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals (case No. 87AP-59) is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings in light of Van Fossen v. Babcock & Wilcox Co. (1988), 36 Ohio St. 3d 100, 522 N.E. 2d 489, decided this date.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
